summary: The American Redemption Systems, Inc. was founded in 1993. The company is based in Stamford, Connecticut. It is a subsidiary of the U.S. Bankruptcy Court for the Southern District of New York. In 1993, the company had a total of 190,434.29 million dollars in debt.
